website_summaries.verdict: The Windows 10 S-powered Asus VivoBook W202 is a rugged budget ultraportable notebook that packs enough power for the classroom, as long as you can overlook the stodgy design.
pros: Rugged design resists spills, drops, and scratches

customer_reviews.title: Keys squeak and not easy to type on
customer_reviews.text: Keys squeak and not easy to type on. Laptop takes some time to catch up with writing and loading takes quite some time too. Mouse is difficult to click and makes it almost impossible to get anything done. I figured with the graphics been advertised so well, that at least the webcam would be good to Skype. Unfortunately, the webcam is extremely poor graphic and skips when someone moves. Very embarrassing to say that the graphics are 'so wonderful' and then have a very low quality camera! Not suitable for gaming needs either. I must say that this laptop is the worst mistake I made.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Langdale

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS LAPTOP! IT IS AN ABSOLUTE PAIN TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the worst laptops I've ever owned in my entire life. For starters, the touchpad is a pain to use, it is really difficult to drag and drop folders and pictures or to highlight documents. Secondly, the laptop is so slow it can just about run Windows 10, also it starts to go slow and freeze after 2 hours of use. Clearly this laptop is not designed for Windows 10 and only for browsing the internet (not watching movies) it really is a total disappointment and I have no idea what Amazon will do with all these returns.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan O'neill

customer_reviews.title: decent cheap and basic laptop
customer_reviews.text: comes with win 10 which will take a few days out of your life with all the updates that will need loading. It is slow to load but once up and running is good enough for light work and video entertainment but as a game machine it would probably crawl. the battery life is good. Win 10 doesn't come with any dvd media player loaded but free software players are still available on the web. Window media player now is sold separately. Most new Laptops no longer come with dvd players so this is a plus to be able to still play your old dvds.
customer_reviews.author: Sedgley Yam

customer_reviews.title: over all, not the worst...
customer_reviews.text: the laptop its self was okay, not as slow as other reviews are claiming if cleared out of all the useless programs ect but a month in to owning it the battery fried its self (it wasn't heavily used or positioned badly) so i can only run it off mains now and of course its under guarantee but as usual no one at asus that can help you and the website magically wont let you submit any information and crashes when you try
customer_reviews.author: Leon Roche

customer_reviews.title: The sound for a laptop is the best I have experienced
customer_reviews.text: Okay if you've got patience because it's unbelievable slow. The sound for a laptop is the best I have experienced. For the money, probably as good as you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Fisher

customer_reviews.title: the most slow Laptop Ever!
customer_reviews.text: it keeps shutting off as if it was unplugged without a battery.it takes forever to boot up.log in screen is just as bad. i tried everything but no go.it still shuts off like a light switch. file explorer keeps freezing. Windows 10 does not help Due to the fact it's like a sloth Its annoying to use. ..i hope they don't sell anymore Windows 10 ASUS Laptops ever again. windows XP and windows 7 were ok . Windows 10 to me a downgrade and a epic Fail.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Probably my own fault because this was bought for me by the man who looks after my computer bits - I was disappointed that it only has two slots to put sticks etc. in and no place to put CDs so I had to buy an external one. But my main disappointment was the letters on the keyboard which are not very bold and the other letters and signs £, $, %, etc. are really tiny and for an old age pensioner is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pigden

customer_reviews.title: Very very slow. Poor quality parts?
customer_reviews.text: The processor, RAM and other points like HDD are very appealing but in all thus laptop is ridiculously slow. After a simple security update it took 1 hour to shut down. It's first boot up too 10 minutes to start up. To do an update for Windows 10 took 10 hours then failed and so I tried again the next day. Again no joy. This PC still hasn't got the latest Windows 10 patch. It's only a few weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe a new laptop can be slow like this. Laptop screen doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe a new laptop can be slow like this. Laptop screen doesn't work. I waited 14 hours for windows 10 latest updates but it stopped at 99% then I had to cancel updating. I would recommend not to buy this laptop. I have to return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Omor ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My GF loves it and its nice and quick for what she needs itr for
customer_reviews.author: Shaff

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this product
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd Asus I have. First one in December which had to be returned as it had a faulty battery. It kept shutting down even though the battery was full. I ordered a 2nd one which arrived 13th April. 2 weeks later the same thing happened to this one. Then it started to have lines appear on the screen, followed by shutdown. It kept trying to go back to earlier version of windows, but wasnt able to and the message went on a loop, so the message appeared, then it shutdown and turned back on, the message appeared and shut down over and over. I will not be buying another Asus
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: Visuals
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the visuals. Not what it says on the tin! "Stunningly sharp 150 % better contrast " I am used to better. DVD player doesn't work with Windows player and doesn't play automatically. Was told by ASUS I would have to download a separate player.
customer_reviews.author: pegeen2011

customer_reviews.title: Completely wasnt worth it! This is a RENEWED laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am so angry I spent my money on this crap. I spent money on something that should've been a good machine. I passed on so many other cheaper laptops and received a laptop that ran slow as hell, starting shutting off after a few months. I waited to long after the warranty to claim it. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Only just worth the low price of €300
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to schedule & good quality sound thru speakers. Son used it for fairly low-tech college work + Spotify & often switched off. Processor slow but what do you expect for €300. Recommend going for better processor if you are planning for multi-tasking or any heavyweight tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Whitbread

customer_reviews.title: too slow
customer_reviews.text: seems like an amazing laptop in theory but it was ridiculously slow, i physically couldn't do things on it so had to be returned unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: K I

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality build
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for first delivery with faulty trackpad. This works a little less clunky but fails as soon as unplugged from mains and moved. Suspect faulty battery. ASUS support suggests reset but this is clearly a hardware fault.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Daykin

customer_reviews.title: alright but not amazing fast
customer_reviews.text: Bit slow, but does the trick ok. what i expect for the money
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and put it toward a something better
customer_reviews.text: Poor product. I am always skeptical of online reviews so tried it and agree with other reviewers on the site. Don't buy it. Put your money toward something better
customer_reviews.author: David G Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear!
customer_reviews.text: Slowest laptop ever! How can a brand-new laptop take over 20 minutes to load a homepage. Steer clear!
customer_reviews.author: Mr A.

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a week so far. The build quality is good and the speakers are better than my Acer. But it is constantly updating Windows (I've only been using it for a week) it takes ages and I don't think it's very good and I am considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my son who seems very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son who seems very pleased with it. A bit on the slow side compared with my own but its good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It keeps turning itself off i dont know what to do about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loss
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after few months. Try to fix but it’s like buy a new one fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah al raji

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disapointed , very slow start and alltogether this product is slow, after charged baterry system colapsed and laptop was turn of. Turn on just with chargen on. I like this brand but this product is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaK

customer_reviews.title: ... this review on my new laptop and am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review on my new laptop and am very pleased with it. It has made things a lot easier for me to present my training along with using the Apeman projector. It's nice and light, so I'm not lugging heavy bags around; a great asset to making my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: pam nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Laptop works as expected and have no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Husband is slowly getting to grips with his new computer and is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop I've had
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very quick delivery. This is the best laptop I've ever had would definitely recommend to anyone great product
customer_reviews.author: Karen Amanda Buck

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back, was too slow. I couldn't do what I had to do.
customer_reviews.author: Van Hoof Irena

customer_reviews.title: only had it a week and it goes off on ...
customer_reviews.text: only had it a week and it goes off on its own and large and clunky. not what I expected so its going back
customer_reviews.author: Shaheen

customer_reviews.title: id recommend it
customer_reviews.text: awesome good price good speed tweak it up a little
customer_reviews.author: wil

customer_reviews.title: Does not what the value @ all
customer_reviews.text: The product does not booth to window level, is bouncy back & switching itself off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good basic laptop, can run a little slow but good for anyone who just wants a standard laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy one for used
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive packed up after one week of use
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Robert Sheard

customer_reviews.title: Rome
customer_reviews.text: All good so far. Be ready to spend a day getting it setup and updates loaded but Rome wasn't built in a day
customer_reviews.author: Bitoblues

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I've had this for two days now and it's so slow all the time. I bought it for university work and just hope it can manage running word without taking 10 minutes to do anything. The only good thing is the speaker. I've been giving it the benefit of the doubt while it was updated and downloading apps etc but two days and no change. Would advise against this product.
customer_reviews.author: Saz6

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: had to return it kept getting stuck in cycles windows updates took days, very slow for a modern laptop even loading pages took forever,went for a macbook air 2017 no comparison far far better fast machine
customer_reviews.author: CLIVEY

customer_reviews.title: JUST STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: It was ok at first then after 5 months refused to open After signing in you got a message that windows failed to open correctly and it was closing down in one minute. Every time you signed in it closed down. First time we had purchased a small lap top and wonder if they are just are not up to the job of keeping a lot of information in them. Amazon have asked us to return it and they will refund the cost and our postage. We will replace it for a more expensive laptop.from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: and has very good quality of the sound
customer_reviews.text: I find this laptop to be very pleasing, especially when you consider the price of the product. For me it is fast enough,bright enough, and has very good quality of the sound. My biggest fear was for me not be able to watch YouTube ,but even that, the laptop could handle properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Shuts down randomly
customer_reviews.text: Does its job alright for the price. However, I have a huge problem: it started shutting down suddenly and randomly a month after I started using it. Since Ii am a student, I ended up losing lots of work and essays as I was working on them. I need to save constantly everything and I am always wary while using it. It's annoying and to a certain degree, stressful. And I can't even get a replacement because it's too late. Too bad, I used to like Asus.
customer_reviews.author: Ioana Burca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bit slow but depends what you want it for. I use it for writing and it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: I. Fitchett

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent enough laptop for the price category it's in but don't expect super computer performance from it
customer_reviews.text: Got as a present for my dad. It's a decent enough laptop for the price category it's in but don't expect super computer performance from it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve-O

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: A really good laptop with bells and whistles- the only issue is that AMAZON failed deliver a brand new one! The PC had a user logged in and it took my I.T savy brother to unlock it after a hour. I am waiting for an explanation of why this was sent out in this condition, A great light easy to use laptop.... Update as of Sept 28th 2017- HAPPY to advise that Amazon have compensated me for the error and I feel it should be commented on. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: S.Heslop

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish do not purchase at any cost when it arrived box was squashed with nothing on box saying fragile the laptop itself is the worst laptop I've ever bought had Asus before that's why I went for this one takes like it seems an eternity to load into windows there are a lot quicker older models out there nothing is quick and it isn't as light as made out to be don't be fooled this laptop is rubbish only worth £50 at the very most
customer_reviews.author: james fosker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the purchase of this laptop I would like to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: most probably due to things like MacAfee that are preinstalled
customer_reviews.text: Stuffed solid with bloatware . [ Subsequent to hooking up to my home lan, an Asus wallpaper appeared on my home Pc desktop without any prompting , that is Malware in my book.] So slow it is unbelievable, most probably due to things like MacAfee that are preinstalled. Will try and assemble the drivers that are needed and then reinstall a clean edition of Windows. Never had such a bad experience with a computer before. My guess is that it will then be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this laptop on the basis of several reviews that described it as lightweight, & the Amazon description says 1.7kg. I was a bit disappointed when it arrived as it felt heavier than I expected. True enough - when I put it on the scales (no packaging or charger etc.) it weighs just under 2kg. Not sure whether I will return it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening_diva

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old Mac works fine with the same Youtube video so it isn't a ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are using solely for e-mail and web browsing it maybe Ok. But for anything else it is painfully slow. When watching you tube you constantly get the wheel of death. My 10 year old Mac works fine with the same Youtube video so it isn't a you tube or broadband speed issue. Also it appears you can't extend the 4GB or RAM that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Backfire

product_meta.title: ASUS X441SA-WX152T VivoBook 14 Inch HD Notebook - (Silver) (Intel Dual-Core Celeron N3060 Processor, 4 GB RAM, 1TB Hard Drive, Bluetooth 4.0, Webcam, Windows 10)
product_meta.description:
ASUS VivoBook Max Series laptops are designed to give you a truly immersive multimedia experience. Powered by SUS Splendid, and ASUS Tru2Life Video and exclusive SonicMaster audio incorporating ICEpower technology, VivoBook Max Series gives you outstanding audio-visuals ever experienced on a laptop.

BOX CONTAINS
ASUS VivoBook Max & Power Adapter
feature_bullets: 14 inch HD screen - ideal for computing at home and on the go
Powered by Intel's Celeron N3060 processor
SonicMaster audio for an enhanced sound experience
Complete connectivity with USB Type C and Bluetooth 4.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars88 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
